legacy.full_text: @elonmusk Elon’s right—NGO fraud is rampant. Our series at The Daily Muck exposed fake Bay Area wetland restorations by an EPA-funded NGO, killing the Delta Smelt. John Sweeney used Grok to file a $665M lawsuit against this eco-fraud empire. Read more https://t.co/BsAwhrA6Lt
